statements: SELECT * FROM waste_transportation
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM waste_transportation
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM waste_transportation WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM waste_transportation WHERE schedule_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM waste_transportation ORDER BY schedule_time DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_transportation WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM waste_transportation WHERE schedule_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, schedule_time FROM waste_transportation WHERE end_location LIKE '%New%';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM waste_transportation WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT route_id, route_name, end_location FROM waste_transportation ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT start_location, end_location FROM waste_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'R%' AND departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY start_location, distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE start_location='City A' AND end_location='City B';
SELECT route_name, distance, departure_time, arrival_time FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01' AND departure_time <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance, departure_time, arrival_time FROM waste_transportation_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Route%' ORDER BY distance DESC;

SELECT ts.vehicle_id, ts.driver_name, wt.route_name, wt.start_location, wt.end_location FROM transportation_schedules ts INNER JOIN waste_transportation_routes wt ON ts.route_id = wt.id WHERE ts.scheduled_departure >= '2022-06-01' AND ts.scheduled_arrival <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_transport_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM waste_transport_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM waste_transport_routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM waste_transport_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;

SELECT ts.schedule_id, ts.departure_time, ts.arrival_time, r.start_location, r.end_location, r.distance_km, cf.carbon_emission_g FROM transportation_schedule ts JOIN waste_transport_routes r ON ts.route_id = r.route_id JOIN carbon_footprint cf ON r.route_id = cf.route_id WHERE ts.departure_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint WHERE carbon_emission_g > 1000;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM waste_transport_routes WHERE distance_km >= 50;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM waste_transport_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT ws.schedule_id, ws.departure_time, ws.arrival_time, wr.start_location, wr.end_location FROM transportation_schedule ws JOIN waste_transport_routes wr ON ws.route_id = wr.route_id;
SELECT cf.route_id, wr.start_location, wr.end_location, cf.carbon_emission_g FROM carbon_footprint cf JOIN waste_transport_routes wr ON cf.route_id = wr.route_id WHERE cf.carbon_emission_g <= 5000;
SELECT * FROM WasteRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM WasteRoutes WHERE distance_km > 10;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance_km FROM WasteRoutes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM WasteRoutes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM WasteRoutes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM WasteRoutes WHERE distance_km > 10 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM WasteRoutes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT * FROM WasteRoutes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY route_name ASC, distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM WasteRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Route%' AND distance_km < 5 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_name, pickup_location, pickup_time FROM WasteCollection WHERE driver_name='John Smith';
SELECT id, disposal_location, disposal_time, disposal_cost FROM WasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_time DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license, driver_phone FROM Driver WHERE driver_email='jane.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM RouteSchedule WHERE route_distance > 50 ORDER BY pickup_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT route_name, pickup_location, pickup_time FROM WasteCollection WHERE driver_name='John Smith';
SELECT id, disposal_location, disposal_method FROM WasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_distance, pickup_time, delivery_time FROM RouteSchedule WHERE route_distance > 100 ORDER BY pickup_time ASC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license, driver_phone, driver_email FROM Driver WHERE driver_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY driver_name;
